settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Most orders will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: What shipping carriers do you use?
settings.answer: We use almost all major national and international carriers including Canada Post, FedEx, UPS, DHL and Purolator. We also partner with logistics companies such as C&D Logistics, Lantrax and Element Freight for larger shipments. We can also use your account if you have one.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world! Smaller items will ship via Canada Post or DHL, but most overseas orders will require a freight quote. Feel free to click the "make an offer" button on any product page and send us your shipping address. Alternatively, you can email us directly with your address and the SKU(s) of the item(s) you are interested in.

settings.title: Can I return my product?
settings.answer: We always aim to make sure our customers are satisfied with their purchase. If you need to return an item, we’re happy to help - just email us directly and we’ll take you through the process.

settings.title: What kind of warranty do you offer?
settings.answer: Due to the nature of our inventory, we offer three different levels of warranty ranging from 0 to 30 to 45 days. For more information, please visit our warranty page (coming soon).

settings.title: Any questions?
settings.answer: Feel free to send us a message and we will be happy to assist you!

settings.contact_info_text: If we still haven't answered your question, you can contact us below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

settings.title: APPRAISAL
settings.content: We’ll leverage our experience to accurately assess the value of your equipment, and develop a customized marketing plan

settings.title: TRANSPORTATION
settings.content: If your strategy requires relocation or storage at our facility, this can be coordinated for you by our dedicated logistics team

settings.title: MARKETING
settings.content: We have developed proprietary software to create extensive listings for your equipment on various sales platforms in order to maximize market exposure

settings.title: NEGOTIATION
settings.content: You set your terms and pricing and we represent your interests from start to finish - HASSLE FREE!  We manage the entire sales process starting from lead generation to ultimately closing the deal as well as the logistics of the sale

settings.title: PAYMENT
settings.content: We finalize the sale and secure payment, then you get paid!

settings.title: SOLUTIONS FOR YOUR EQUIPMENT
settings.content:
Lenmark will sell your equipment,
giving you the highest value with no hassle.

settings.title: LIST WITH LENMARK
settings.content:
✓ Maximized value for your equipment
✓ Access to our 10+ marketing channels
✓ Avoid uncertainties from auction selling prices.

settings.title: EXPERTISE
settings.subheading: Our sales and buying teams are uniquely qualified to appraise, list, show and negotiate the sale of your equipment.

settings.title: NETWORK
settings.subheading: Gain access to our extensive marketing network, including a wealth of direct industry contacts and an online sales platform with international viewership.

settings.title: REACH
settings.subheading: Our marketing program spans all major online sales channels – so no matter where potential buyers are searching, your equipment is visible to them.

settings.title: BUY-OUT PROGRAM
settings.content: Get cash for your equipment, now! In most cases, we can get cash in your hand same-day.

settings.title: Join our team
settings.content: A short sentence describing your job offer

settings.process-terms-content:
• TAILORED APPRAISAL
Every asset is unique, which is why we do a tailored appraisal to determine the value of your specific equipment. • FAIR EQUIPMENT VALUE
We have dedicated staff ensuring the value of your equipment is brought to market fairly. • MARKET RESEARCH
Industry-leading market research and comparables of similar equipment. • YOU SET THE PRICE
Pricing happens with YOU in control.

• DEDICATED LOGISTICS TEAM
We move large assets every day with a dedicated in-house team, removing the headache of you having to plan yourself. • PARTNERED WITH FREIGHT COMPANIES
We partner with freight companies who are experts with heavy equipment, allowing you to move with confidence! • WE CAN STORE YOUR EQUIPMENT
If you need the floor space, we can purchase your assets and store them at our facility

• WORLDWIDE EXPOSURE
Our proprietary platform gives your equipment worldwide exposure. • GOES TO MARKET QUICKLY
In-house subject matter experts make sure that your equipment is represented accurately and posted quickly. • MARKETING EFFORTS
We invest thousands into digital marketing every month, ensuring your equipment is at the top of every search result.

• HIGHEST EQUIPMENT VALUE
We have a dedicated sales team to represent your equipment, ensuring top value for you. • WE HANDLE THE SALE
We handle the negotiation, pricing, logistics & questions on your behalf. • YOU DECIDE ON THE PRICE
You set your bottom line. We negotiate to bring you the top line.

• WE HANDLE THE PAYMENT
We take care of ensuring the payment is made and that there is no “funny business”. • WE CAN PROCESS ANY TRANSACTION
Local sales, national sales, or worldwide sales, we have the capacity and experience to complete all parts of the transaction – even if it is cross-border.

settings.description: Large or small, Lenmark Finance has a solution  for your company

settings.section_sub_heading:
Lenmark Finance offers an easy way to get personalized financing

backed by our team of Certified Commercial Finance Managers.

settings.description:
At Lenmark, we take customer service seriously. And that includes
helping you get the financing you need. That’s why we have Certified
Commercial Finance Mangers to give you the best advice on what
solution is right for your business.

settings.description: Please complete this form, our expert advisor will be in touch with you.

settings.sub-heading-text: Industry Solutions - Your hub for buying, selling, and renting equipment.

settings.text_3: Revolutionizing The Way To Buy and Sell Used Equipment
settings.text_5: Leonard + Mark started buying and selling from auctions until they thought of a new and better way to buy and sell. From there, the development went forward and utilized the power of e-commerce and digitalization. They used a new strategy and built it to help give alternatives to the traditional auctions.

settings.heading_text: Lenmark Offers More Than Just A  Platform To Sell Your Equipment
settings.sub_heading_text: We Stand Out By Not Standing By
